title: Start
body:
<<Deck>>
Alright, we're finally here!
<<Wenn>>
Whoooaaa... Everything's so white.
<<Tim>> 
Well that IS what this place is famous for. Rumour has it that the snow here has a mysterious power.
<<Wenn>>
Reaalllyy???
<<Merry>> 
He's not wrong. From my research, it's got something to do with what it's made out of.
<<Deck>>
Yeah sure. So, when do we get to have snowball fights, a-and make snow angels, oh oh! And build a snowman??
<<Merry>> 
chuckles Hold on Deck. I need you guys to collect snow for an experiment I'm doing, but if you want, you can make a sno-
<<Deck>> 
Get snow, give snow to Merry, got it! Come on guys, let's go!
<<Wenn>> 
Huh? W-w-wait! Deck!!
<<Tim>> 
Off we go!
<<Merry>> 
Guys!... sigh This should be interesting.
